            /* Accessibility improvements */
            
            /* Skip link styling */
            .skip-link {
              position: absolute;
              left: -999px;
              top: auto;
              z-index: 1000;
              padding: 0.5rem 1rem;
              background: #fff;
              border: 2px solid currentColor;
              text-decoration: none;
              color: #000;
            }
            
            .skip-link:focus {
              left: 1rem;
              top: 1rem;
            }
            
            /* Focus visibility for all interactive elements */
            :focus-visible {
              outline: 3px solid currentColor;
              outline-offset: 3px;
            }
            
            /* Better focus visibility for reveal.js controls */
            .reveal .controls button:focus-visible {
              outline: 3px solid #fff;
              outline-offset: 3px;
            }
            
            /* Ensure tooltips are keyboard accessible */
            [data-tippy-root] {
              position: relative;
            }
            
            [data-tippy-root] [tabindex]:not([tabindex="-1"]) {
              outline: 3px solid currentColor when focused;
            }
            
            /* Make sure slide menu button is keyboard accessible */
            .slide-menu-button {
              outline: 3px solid currentColor when focused;
            }
            
            /* Reduced motion support */
            @media (prefers-reduced-motion: reduce) {
              * {
                animation: none !important;
                transition: none !important;
                scroll-behavior: auto !important;
              }
              
              /* Keep essential reveal.js transitions but make them instant */
              .reveal .slides section {
                transition-duration: 0ms !important;
              }
              
              .reveal .slides section .fragment {
                transition: none !important;
              }
              
              /* Disable cursor blinking animation */
              .cursor {
                animation: none !important;
              }
            }
            </style>
